name: Angler (Tuff Pie)
description:
Use your light [spacebar] to navigate [w,a,s,d / directional buttons] through the cave and reach the surface.

Your light repels some creatures while attracts others.

Try  and find all 11 seaweeds.

Made for the Untitled Game Jam #46, this game is a team effort of lefteris_faidas, kostisb and yours truly.

Tested only for Windows.

Humble Fonts were used in this game. Many thanks!
